name: Apple Pie by Grandma Ople
author: MOSHASMAMA
summary: This was my grandmother's apple pie recipe.  I have never seen another one quite like it.  It will always be my favorite and has won me several first place prizes in local competitions.  I hope it becomes one of your favorites as well!
ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie
8  Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Melt the butter in a saucepan
Stir in flour to form a paste
Add water, white sugar and brown sugar, and bring to a boil
Place the bottom crust in your pan
Cover with a lattice work crust
Gently pour the sugar and butter liquid over the crust
Pour slowly so that it does not run off
Bake 15 minutes in the preheated oven
Reduce the temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Continue baking for 35 to 45 minutes, until apples are soft
